title: Sell Yamazaki
metaDescription: Sell your Yamazaki whisky to Proof Cellars. We buy 12, 18, 25 year, Limited Edition, and Sherry Cask. Direct offers.
heroSubhead: We buy Yamazaki directly - from 12 Year to rare limited editions.
introParagraph: Yamazaki is Japan's first and most iconic single malt whisky distillery. We buy Yamazaki directly, including aged expressions and limited releases like the Sherry Cask. Submit photos and details to receive an offer with no consignment fees.
whatWeBuy: Yamazaki Mizunara and other cask finishes
whatWeDoNotBuy: Items we cannot legally purchase in your state

Fill level visible in the bottle

faqs.question: Which Yamazaki expressions do you buy?
faqs.answer: We buy Yamazaki 12, 18, and 25 Year expressions, Limited Editions, Sherry Cask releases, and other special bottlings.

faqs.question: Is Yamazaki 12 Year valuable?
faqs.answer: Yes. Yamazaki 12 Year has become allocated and in demand. Current availability affects pricing.

faqs.question: What is Yamazaki Sherry Cask?
faqs.answer: Yamazaki Sherry Cask editions are aged or finished in sherry casks. These limited releases gained worldwide acclaim and are highly collectible.

faqs.question: Do you verify Yamazaki authenticity?
faqs.answer: Yes. Japanese whisky has high counterfeiting rates. We carefully review photos and conduct full verification during physical inspection.

faqs.question: Does the box add value?
faqs.answer: Yes. Original boxes add significant value for Yamazaki, especially for aged expressions and limited releases.

faqs.question: How quickly will I receive an offer?
faqs.answer: We typically respond within one business day for Yamazaki submissions.

faqs.question: What is Yamazaki Mizunara?
faqs.answer: Yamazaki has released expressions aged or finished in Japanese Mizunara oak. These are rare and collectible.

faqs.question: Why is aged Yamazaki so scarce?
faqs.answer: Japanese whisky production was not planned for current global demand. Limited stock of aged whisky has driven scarcity and collector interest.
